EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for viewing the Gartner Market Guide for Container Management Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for viewing the Gartner Market Guide for Container Management Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-container-management-software]]>. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
